groups.name: gremlin
groups.description: Configuration properties for Apache TinkerPop Gremlin connectivity.

groups.name: gremlin.cluster
groups.description: Cluster mode configuration for connecting to multiple Gremlin Server hosts with load balancing.

groups.name: gremlin.connection-pool
groups.description: Connection pool configuration for Gremlin driver.

properties.name: gremlin.host
properties.description: Gremlin Server host address for simple single-host mode. Mutually exclusive with 'cluster' and 'writer/readers' configurations.

properties.name: gremlin.port
properties.description: Port that the Gremlin Server is listening on.

properties.name: gremlin.cluster.hosts
properties.description: List of Gremlin Server host addresses for cluster mode. Requests are load-balanced across all hosts using round-robin strategy.

properties.name: gremlin.writer
properties.description: Gremlin Server host address dedicated for write operations in writer/reader mode. Requires 'readers' to also be configured.

properties.name: gremlin.readers
properties.description: List of Gremlin Server host addresses dedicated for read operations in writer/reader mode. Requests are load-balanced across all readers. Requires 'writer' to also be configured.

properties.name: gremlin.username
properties.description: Username for authentication to Gremlin Server. Must be used together with 'password'.

properties.name: gremlin.password
properties.description: Password for authentication to Gremlin Server. Must be used together with 'username'.

properties.name: gremlin.enable-ssl
properties.description: Enable SSL/TLS connectivity. The Gremlin Server must be configured with SSL enabled.

properties.name: gremlin.serializer
properties.description: Message serializer to use for communication with Gremlin Server. Determines the format of data sent and received.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-timeout
properties.description: Maximum time to wait when establishing a connection to the Gremlin Server.

properties.name: gremlin.request-timeout
properties.description: Maximum time to wait for a request to complete.

properties.name: gremlin.keep-alive-interval
properties.description: Time to wait on an idle connection before sending a keep-alive request. If not set, keep-alive is disabled.

properties.name: gremlin.channelizer
properties.description: Channelizer implementation to use for the connection. Determines the transport protocol (WebSocket, HTTP, etc.).

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.min-connections-per-host
properties.description: Minimum size of the connection pool. Connections are created to this size when the client starts.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.max-connections-per-host
properties.description: Maximum size that the connection pool can grow to.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.max-simultaneous-usage-per-connection
properties.description: Maximum number of times a connection can be borrowed from the pool simultaneously. Setting too high may cause request queuing; too low forces unnecessary waits.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.max-in-process-per-connection
properties.description: Maximum number of in-flight requests allowed on a single connection. Indicates connection busyness.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.max-wait-for-connection
properties.description: Maximum time to wait for a connection to be borrowed from the pool.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.max-wait-for-close
properties.description: Maximum time to wait for a connection to close gracefully before timing out.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.max-content-length
properties.description: Maximum size in bytes of any request sent to the server.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.result-iteration-batch-size
properties.description: Number of results to return per batch from the server. Overrides the server-side setting.

properties.name: gremlin.connection-pool.reconnect-interval
properties.description: Time to wait between retries when attempting to reconnect to a dead host.
